definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be wise (NH id.; Aram. h.kam, [[חֲכַם]] id.; Zinj. [[חכמה]] wisdom, DHM:sendsch.57; As. ḫakâmu, know (with exceptional [[חַ]] v. Dl:Pr 178 f.); Ar.h.akama restrain from acting in an evil manner, judge, govern; IV.make firm, sound, free from defect by the exercise of skill)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[ח]] Pr 23:15; 3 fs. [[חָֽכְמָה]] Zec 9:2; [[הָכַמְתָּ]] Pr 9:12, Pr 9:12, etc. + 3 t. Pf.; Impf. [[יֶחְכַּם]] Pr 9:9, Pr 21:11; [[וַיֶּחְכַּם]] 1Ki 5:11; [[יֶחְבָָּם]] Pr 20:1+; [[וֶ֠חְכָָּם]] Pr 13:20; [[תֶּחְכַּם]] Pr 19:20; [[אֶחְכָָּמָה]] Ec 7:23; pl. [[יֶחְכָָּמוּ]] Job 32:9; Imv. [[חֲכַם]] Pr 27:11; [[חֲכָָם]] Pr 6:6, Pr 23:19 + Pr 13:20 Kt; [[חֲכָָמוּ]] Pr 8:33; —be or become wise, act wisely De 32:29 (poet.) 1Ki 5:11, Job 32:9, Pr 6:6, Pr 8:33, Pr 9:9, Pr 9:12, Pr 9:12, Pr 13:20, Pr 19:20, Pr 20:1, Pr 21:11, Pr 23:19, Pr 27:11, Ec 2:15, Ec 7:23, Zec 9:2; [[אם חכם לבך]] if thy mind be wise Pr 23:15; c. acc. [[שׁחכמתי]] Ec 2:19 wherein I have acted wisely.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְחַכֵּם]] Ps 105:22; sf. [[יְחַכְּמֵנוּ]] Job 35:11; [[תְּחַכְּמֵנִי]] Ps 119:98; all make wise, teach wisdom, c. acc

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. made wise, intensive, as it were the embodiment of wisdom [[חוֹבֵר חֲבָרִים מְחֻכָּם]] Ps 58:6, pl. [[הֵמָּה]] [[חֲכָמִים מְחֻכָּמִים]] Pr 30:24 (of intelligent animals).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. cstr. [[מַחְכִּימַת פֶָּתִי]] Ps 19:8 making wise the simple.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[נִתְחַכְּמָה לוֹ]] Ex 1:10 (E) let us deal wisely (shrewdly) toward it (the people); 2 ms. [[תִּתְחַכַּם]] Ec 7:16 make or shew thyself wise.
